text.__SUMMARY__:
Hieracium alpinum, the alpine hawkweed, is a Eurasian plant species in the dandelion tribe within the sunflower family. It is native to Europe, and has also been found in Greenland.Hieracium alpinum is an herb up to 25 cm (9.8 in) tall, with leaves mostly in a rosette at the bottom. Leaves are lance-shaped, up to 8 cm (3.1 in) long. One stalk will usually produce only one flower head, though occasionally 2 or 3. Each head has 80-120 yellow ray flowers but no disc flowers.
